radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the brain and temporal bones
radiographic_examinations.findings: Fluid in the right middle ear and mastoid air cells, hemorrhage within the right external auditory canal, no associated bony destruction.
Opacification of the right mastoid air cells and middle ear, no abnormality evident in the brain.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Repeat MRI of the brain with gadolinium
radiographic_examinations.findings: Unchanged opacification in the right mastoid air cells and middle ear, no extraaxial fluid collection or acute infarction.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes noted in measurements or findings.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the skull base after contrast
radiographic_examinations.findings: Opacification of the right middle ear and mastoid air cells, no destruction of bony mastoid septa.
